Body.Content:
We are announcing the Copilot provides more accurate answers to questions feature for Copilot for Power Automate. This feature lets Copilot give better and more accurate answers and will be available on December 31, 2024.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, Copilot answers your questions with improved accuracy, leveraging better documentation grounding methods.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Copilot for Power Automate - Copilot provides more accurate answers to questions
